00054     //File
00055         /// Open a file and collect information about it (technical information and tags)
00056         /// @brief Open a file
00057         /// @param File_Name Full name of file to open
00058         /// @retval 0 File not opened
00059         /// @retval 1 File opened
00060     size_t Open (const String &File_Name);
00061         /// Open a Buffer (Begin and end of the stream) and collect information about it (technical information and tags)
00062         /// @brief Open a buffer
00063         /// @param Begin First bytes of the buffer
00064         /// @param Begin_Size Size of Begin
00065         /// @param End Last bytes of the buffer
00066         /// @param End_Size Size of End
00067         /// @retval 0 File not opened
00068         /// @retval 1 File opened
00069     size_t Open (const int8u* Begin, size_t Begin_Size, const int8u* End=NULL, size_t End_Size=0, int64u FileSize=0);
00070         /// Open a stream and collect information about it (technical information and tags)
00071         /// @brief Open a stream (Init)
00072         /// @param File_Size Estimated file size
00073         /// @param File_Offset Offset of the file (if we don't have the beginning of the file)
00074     size_t Open_Buffer_Init (int64u File_Size=(int64u)-1, int64u File_Offset=0);
00075         /// Open a stream and collect information about it (technical information and tags)
00076         /// @brief Open a stream (Continue)
00077         /// @param Buffer pointer to the stream
00078         /// @param Buffer_Size Count of bytes to read
00079     size_t Open_Buffer_Continue (const int8u* Buffer, size_t Buffer_Size);
00080         /// Open a stream and collect information about it (technical information and tags)
00081         /// @brief Open a stream (Get the needed file Offset)
00082         /// @return the needed offset of the file \n
00083         ///         File size if no more bytes are needed
00084     int64u Open_Buffer_Continue_GoTo_Get ();
00085         /// Open a stream and collect information about it (technical information and tags)
00086         /// @brief Open a stream (Finalize)
00087     size_t Open_Buffer_Finalize ();
00088         /// Save the file opened before with Open() (modifications of tags)
00089         /// @brief Save the file
00090         /// @retval 0 failed
00091         /// @retval 1 suceed
00092     size_t Save ();
00093         /// Close a file opened before with Open() (without saving)
00094         /// @brief Close a file
00095         /// @warning without have saved before, modifications are lost
00096     void Close ();
00097 
00098     //General information
00099         /// Get all details about a file in one string
00100         /// @brief Get all details about a file
00101         /// @pre You can change default presentation with Inform_Set()
00102     String Inform (size_t Reserved=0);

00104     //Get
00105         /// Get a piece of information about a file (parameter is an integer)
00106         /// @brief Get a piece of information about a file (parameter is an integer)
00107         /// @param StreamKind Kind of stream (general, video, audio...)
00108         /// @param StreamNumber Stream number in Kind of stream (first, second...)
00109         /// @param Parameter Parameter you are looking for in the stream (Codec, width, bitrate...), in integer format (first parameter, second parameter...)
00110         /// @param InfoKind Kind of information you want about the parameter (the text, the measure, the help...)
00111         /// @return a string about information you search \n
00112         ///         an empty string if there is a problem
00113     String Get (stream_t StreamKind, size_t StreamNumber, size_t Parameter, info_t InfoKind=Info_Text);
00114         /// Get a piece of information about a file (parameter is a string)
00115         /// @brief Get a piece of information about a file (parameter is a string)
00116         /// @param StreamKind Kind of stream (general, video, audio...)
00117         /// @param StreamNumber Stream number in Kind of stream (first, second...)
00118         /// @param Parameter Parameter you are looking for in the stream (Codec, width, bitrate...), in string format ("Codec", "Width"...) \n
00119         ///        See Option("Info_Parameters") to have the full list
00120         /// @param InfoKind Kind of information you want about the parameter (the text, the measure, the help...)
00121         /// @param SearchKind Where to look for the parameter
00122         /// @return a string about information you search \n
00123         ///         an empty string if there is a problem
00124     String Get (stream_t StreamKind, size_t StreamNumber, const String &Parameter, info_t InfoKind=Info_Text, info_t SearchKind=Info_Name);
00125 
00126     //Set
00127         /// Set a piece of information about a file (parameter is an integer)
00128         /// @brief Set a piece of information about a file (parameter is an int)
00129         /// @param StreamKind Kind of stream (general, video, audio...)
00130         /// @param StreamNumber Stream number in Kind of stream (first, second...)
00131         /// @param Parameter Parameter you are looking for in the stream (Codec, width, bitrate...), in integer format (first parameter, second parameter...)
00132         /// @param OldValue The old value of the parameter \n if OldValue is empty and ToSet is filled : tag is added \n if OldValue is filled and ToSet is filled : tag is replaced \n if OldValue is filled and ToSet is empty : tag is deleted
00133         /// @retval >0 succeed
00134         /// @retval 0 failed
00135     size_t Set (const String &ToSet, stream_t StreamKind, size_t StreamNumber, size_t Parameter, const String &OldValue=_T(""));
00136         /// Set a piece of information about a file (parameter is a string)
00137         /// @brief Set information about a file (parameter is a string)
00138         /// @param StreamKind Kind of stream (general, video, audio...)
00139         /// @param StreamNumber Stream number in Kind of stream (first, second...)
00140         /// @param Parameter Parameter you are looking for in the stream (Codec, width, bitrate...), in string format
00141         /// @param OldValue The old value of the parameter \n if OldValue is empty and ToSet is filled : tag is added \n if OldValue is filled and ToSet is filled : tag is replaced \n if OldValue is filled and ToSet is empty : tag is deleted
00142         /// @retval >0 succeed
00143         /// @retval 0 failed
00144     size_t Set (const String &ToSet, stream_t StreamKind, size_t StreamNumber, const String &Parameter, const String &OldValue=_T(""));

00146     //Output_Buffered
00147         /// Output buffer pointer and size retrieving, used for File_Duplicate option.
00148         /// @brief Output buffer pointer and size retrieving
00149         /// @param Value The name of the duplicated program
00150         /// @param Output_Buffer A pointer on the output buffer, NULL if there is nothing in the buffer \n
00151         ///        Note: you must use all the size of the buffer before the next call to this procedure
00152         /// @return The size of the used buffer
00153     size_t Output_Buffer_Get (const Ztring &Value, char** Output_Buffer=NULL);
00154 
00155     //Info
00156         /// Configure or get information about MediaInfoLib
00157         /// @param Option The name of option
00158         /// @param Value The value of option
00159         /// @return Depend of the option : by default "" (nothing) means No, other means Yes
00160         /// @post Known options are : \n
00161         ///       * (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET) "BlockMethod" : Configure when Open Method must return (default or not command not understood : "1") \n
00162         ///                 "0" : Immediatly \n
00163         ///                 "1" : After geting local information \n
00164         ///                 "2" : When user interaction is needed, or whan Internet information is get
00165         ///       * "Complete" : For debug, configure if MediaInfoLib::Inform() show all information (doesn't care of InfoOption_NoShow tag) : shows all information if true, shows only useful for user information if false (No by default)\n
00166         ///       * "Complete_Get" : return the state of "Complete" \n
00167         ///       * "Language" : Configure language (default language, and this object); Value is Description of language (format : "Column1;Colum2\n...) \n
00168         ///                 Column 1 : Unique name ("Bytes", "Title") \n
00169         ///                 Column 2 : translation ("Octets", "Titre") \n
00170         ///       * "Language_Get" : Get the language file in memory
00171         ///       * "Language_Update" : Configure language of this object only (for optimisation); Value is Description of language (format : "Column1;Colum2\n...) \n
00172         ///                 Column 1 : Unique name ("Bytes", "Title") \n
00173         ///                 Column 2 : translation ("Octets", "Titre") \n
00174         ///       * "Inform" : Configure custom text, See MediaInfoLib::Inform() function; Description of views (format : "Column1;Colum2...) \n
00175         ///                 Column 1 : code (11 lines : "General", "Video", "Audio", "Text", "Chapters", "Begin", "End", "Page_Begin", "Page_Middle", "Page_End") \n
00176         ///                 Column 2 : The text to show (exemple : "Audio : %FileName% is at %BitRate/String%") \n
00177         ///       * "ParseUnknownExtensions" : Configure if MediaInfo parse files with unknown extension\n
00178         ///       * "ParseUnknownExtensions_Get" : Get if MediaInfo parse files with unknown extension\n
00179         ///       * "ShowFiles" : Configure if MediaInfo keep in memory files with specific kind of streams (or no streams); Value is Description of components (format : "Column1;Colum2\n...) \n\n
00180         ///                 Column 1 : code (available : "Nothing" for unknown format, "VideoAudio" for at least 1 video and 1 audio, "VideoOnly" for video streams only, "AudioOnly", "TextOnly") \n
00181         ///                 Column 2 : "" (nothing) not keeping, other for keeping
00182         ///       * (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET) "TagSeparator" : Configure the separator if there are multiple same tags (" | " by default)\n
00183         ///       * (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET) "TagSeparator_Get" : return the state of "TagSeparator" \n
00184         ///       * (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET) "Internet" : Authorize Internet connection (Yes by default)
00185         ///       * (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET) "Internet_Title_Get" : When State=5000, give all possible titles for this file (one per line) \n
00186         ///                 Form : Author TagSeparator Title TagSeparator Year\n...
00187         ///       * (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET) "Internet_Title_Set" : Set the Good title (same as given by Internet_Title_Get) \n
00188         ///                 Form : Author TagSeparator Title TagSeparator Year
00189         ///       * "Info_Parameters" : Information about what are known unique names for parameters \n
00190         ///       * "Info_Parameters_CSV" : Information about what are known unique names for parameters, in CSV format \n
00191         ///       * "Info_Capacities" : Information about which parameters per format are supported \n
00192         ///       * "Info_Codecs" : Information about which codec is known \n
00193         ///       * "Info_Version" : Information about the version of MediaInfoLib
00194         ///       * "Info_Url" : Information about where to find the last version
00195     String        Option (const String &Option, const String &Value=_T(""));
00196     static String Option_Static (const String &Option, const String &Value=_T(""));
00197         /// @brief (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET) Get the state of the library
00198         /// @retval <1000 No information is available for the file yet
00199         /// @retval >=1000_<5000 Only local (into the file) information is available, getting Internet information (titles only) is no finished yet
00200         /// @retval 5000 (only if Internet connection is accepted) User interaction is needed (use Option() with "Internet_Title_Get") \n
00201         ///              Warning : even there is only one possible, user interaction (or the software) is needed
00202         /// @retval >5000<=10000 Only local (into the file) information is available, getting Internet information (all) is no finished yet
00203         /// @retval <10000 Done
00204     size_t                  State_Get ();
00205         /// @brief Count of streams of a stream kind (StreamNumber not filled), or count of piece of information in this stream
00206         /// @param StreamKind Kind of stream (general, video, audio...)
00207         /// @param StreamNumber Stream number in this kind of stream (first, second...)
00208     size_t                  Count_Get (stream_t StreamKind, size_t StreamNumber=(size_t)-1);
